Kosberg Made It

Documentary, 2020

Brief

What begins as simmering dread becomes a fully-formed nightmare, inhabited by her darkest memories and fears in visionary filmmader Alex Garland's (Ex Machina, Annihilation) feverish, shape-shifting new horror film.

Approach

What begins as simmering dread becomes a fully-formed nightmare, inhabited by her darkest memories and fears in visionary filmmader.

Impact

What begins as simmering dread becomes a fully-formed nightmare, inhabited by her darkest memories and fears in visionary filmmader Alex Garland's (Ex Machina, Annihilation).
